name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Integrity Engineer with a strong foundation in **Data Analysis**, **Database Development**, and **Quality Assurance**. Bringing 9+ years of experience in **requirement specification**, **process analysis**, and utilizing tools such as **Excel**, **Microsoft Access**, **Minitab**, and **SPSS** to drive informed decision-making. Proven track record of applying analytical skills to improve processes and ensure the integrity of data. Excellent at communication and fostering teamwork while also excelling in independent work environments. Additionally, as a .NET Full Stack Developer, skilled in **microservices architecture**, **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, **Redis**, **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **.NET**, and **C#**, with a commitment to delivering robust and optimized solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
• Conducted comprehensive **Data Analysis** to identify opportunities for system optimization, improving performance metrics by **20%**.
• Designed and developed **Database Development** protocols to enhance data integrity and availability, leading to reduced downtime by **15%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, leveraging strong **Communication** skills to ensure alignment on project requirements and deliverables.
• Executed **Quality Assurance** processes, including testing and validation of application features to ensure reliability and adherence to specifications.
• Managed project documentation for **Requirement Specification** and **Process Analysis**, contributing to clearer project workflows and reducing development ambiguities.
• Utilized **Minitab** and **SPSS** for advanced statistical analysis, aiding in decision-making processes by providing actionable insights.
• Enhanced team collaboration by fostering a spirit of **Teamwork** while also demonstrating proficiency in **Independent Work** when required.
• Employed **Excel** and **Microsoft Access** for data management and reporting tasks, streamlining information access for stakeholders.
• Initiated improvements in operational processes based on thorough **Analytical Skills**, targeting increased efficiency across project phases.
• Led internal workshops to share knowledge on best practices and encourage continuous improvement among team members.

Conducted data analysis and process analysis to enhance project integrity, ensuring compliance with **EMAT** and **UTCD** standards.
Utilized **Microsoft Access** and **Excel** for comprehensive database development and data management, improving reporting efficiency by **20%**.

Prepared and delivered clear communication regarding project status and requirements to stakeholders, enhancing transparency and project alignment.
Mentored junior engineers in analytical skills and independent work practices, pushing team productivity enhancements by **15%**.
Developed advanced charts and graphs for project status tracking, utilizing tools like **D3.js** to provide interactive insights for stakeholders.
Conducted regular code reviews and facilitated team discussions to uphold coding standards and encourage innovative solutions.
